Title: Modern UI/UX improvements

Description:
Redesign the web interface for a more modern, engaging user experience. Add smooth animations, improved navigation, and responsive layouts. Consider using a UI framework (e.g., Material UI, Bootstrap) and add visual enhancements such as sliders, cards, and transitions.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Updated, modern look and feel
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Improved navigation and layout
- Responsive design for desktop and mobile
